objects.text:
• Sleek Modern Design
• Energy-Efficient Technology
• Space-Saving Compact Build
• Multiple Drying Cycles

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Compact Ventless Dryer - Modern Laundry Solution
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek white modern design with large digital display and intuitive controls
• 🌟 Multiple drying cycles including Normal, Heavy Duty, Delicates, and Quick Dry
• ⚡ Energy-efficient ventless condensing technology
• 🎯 Precise moisture sensors for optimal drying results
• 📱 LED display with time remaining and cycle status indicators
• 🔄 Adjustable temperature settings for various fabric types
• 🏠 Space-saving compact design perfect for apartments and small homes
• 🔧 Easy-access maintenance panel for simple upkeep
• 🌿 Eco-friendly operation with reduced energy consumption
• ⚙️ Durable construction with premium components for long-lasting performance

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and visually compelling layout designed for promoting a compact home appliance. The upper half is split with a strong blue gradient grid background that transitions to a soft light grey in the lower right, providing a clean contrast. Dominating the right side is a high-resolution image of the product ("product_image"), while the left carries layered brand content. The main branding ("heading") is styled in a futuristic, bold sans-serif typeface. It's followed by a large, bold secondary title ("subheading") and a clean tagline ("tagline") to reinforce the message. Beneath that, a set of clear bullet points ("description") highlights key features. The bold pricing ("price") draws attention to affordability, and a dark blue rounded call-to-action button ("cta") with a high-contrast label invites user engagement. The grid overlay and subtle circular graphics enhance the structure and depth.

**Color Palette:**
- Cobalt Blue #2D6CDF
- Sky Blue #4FB3D9
- Royal Blue #3A7CF0
- Navy #162B5B
- White #FFFFFF
- Light Grey #F5F5F5
- Steel Grey #E0E0E0
product_color: The product image showcases a modern washing machine with a sleek and minimalistic design. The primary color is a crisp white (#F8F8F8), which dominates the appliance body, giving it a clean and contemporary look. The drum door features a glossy black finish (#1A1A1A), acting as a strong contrast and focal point. The digital screen uses a deep black background (#000000) with bright blue (#00BFFF) and white (#FFFFFF) text for visibility. Subtle shades of gray (#B0B0B0) are used for panel details and settings. Together, these colors are smartly blended with high contrast to emphasize modern appeal, making them ideal for an advertisement banner.
